pages.text: This $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() separates a $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demon$() from their hellish home by sacrificing a human using an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$().$(br2)$(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Demons$() offer a variety of trades, but they will usually attack you unless you wear $(l:bewitchment:tools/besmirched_armor)Besmirched Armor$().$(br2)If they do attack you, keep them away from anything flammable.
